name: Playroom Racer HD
description:
Almost every child played with toy cars, now you can play these sensational races on your iPad in top-down racer style. Select your favourite car and playroom and get ready to go. Progress through the races, collect more and more stars to unlock new vehicles and locations.

GAME MODES
Put the pedal down to cross the finish line first in Race mode. You will be awarded stars depending on your final position. You can also collect stars in Star Hunt mode or improve your driving skills and beat the clock in Time Trial.

ROOMS
Challenge your opponents in 4 different playrooms.

VEHICLES
6 vehicle categories, each with 4 paint jobs, different performance and driving characteristics.

FEATURES
- 4 beautiful scenes to explore
- 6 different vehicles
- 3 game modes
- Stunning 3D graphics powered by Metal on compatible devices
- Realistic physics simulation
- Easy to learn touch or tilt controls
- Game Center leaderboards
